verses.roman:
apūrva mādhurī kṛṣṇera, apūrva tāra bala
yāhāra śravaṇe mana haya ṭalamala

synonyms: apūrva—unprecedented; mādhurī—sweetness; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; apūrva—unprecedented; tāra—of that; bala—the strength; yāhāra—of which; śravaṇe—in hearing; mana—the mind; haya—becomes; ṭalamala—unsteady.
translation: The sweetness of Lord Kṛṣṇa is unprecedented, and its strength is also unprecedented. Simply by one's hearing of such beauty, the mind becomes unsteady.
